# switchcloud_project_member (Resource)

A member of a project in the Switchcloud platform.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) Project ID to which the member should be managed.

### Optional

- `email` (String) Email of the project member
- `user_id` (String) User ID of the project member

### Read-Only

- `display_name` (String) Display name of the project member
- `id` (String) Project member identifier
